Over the next few months, you decide to relax and test this new life out. You paid good money to Bodies Inc. to be young again. You want to make sure you like it. You managed to screw up your former life pretty bad and needed a new change. You never had a caring mother growing up. You figured that would help this time around. You wanted a second try at life again. With the knowledge you have, you would be better prepared this time around not to make the same mistakes.

Although you hadn’t planned on becoming a girl, you figured it might be easier than before. Growing up as a boy was tough. You weren’t good at sports and were bullied by the jocks. You were small and scrawny and never had luck with women. It wasn’t until college that things became easier. You matured into a good looking guy and were able to finally meet some women. However, the first 18 years of your male life was miserable. You knew growing up as a girl would be easier. You wouldn’t have to worry about acting macho all the time. You wouldn’t have to be good at sports. It would be much more relaxing than before.

You knew girls had to deal with other things though. Puberty would certainly be a different experience. But this time around, you’d be smarter with things. You were already cute as a 18 month old. You knew this body would end up being pretty and have no problem making friends. It would be so much easier to be part of the cool crowd growing up this time.

You had spent 3 months so far as little girl. You decided to fully immerse yourself into this life to make sure you want to stay. You enjoyed getting dressed up and wearing cute clothes. Your Mom even got your ears pierced and you started wearing earrings. Mom loved having an eager little girl around. She bought you tons of girl toys that you were getting used to. You were starting to talk a little better, but you still didn’t have much bowel control. You knew that would eventually fix itself though. Although you still had most of your normal male brain, there were some changes that you couldn’t control. For example you couldn’t read anymore, you couldn’t count numbers, and you weren’t able to recall much from school. That was strange to get used to. Patrick had warned you about these things. Your brain had the information inside, you would just have to re-learn it again.

Patrick drove you to the 3 month Bodies Inc. checkup. You could tell he was nervous about the meeting. If you wanted to, you could leave this life and get another body. That would mean Patrick would have to go back to being a little girl again. You made sure Mom dressed you in one of your prettiest dresses for the checkup. You needed to look your best to make a new contract.

Once inside, a Bodies Inc. employee put you and Patrick into a private room. He hooked up a device around your neck and explained, “This is new technology. While you wear this, you will be able to talk normal and access your prior knowledge. Your case worker will be in soon. “ The employee left you two alone.

You tried the new device and started talking, “Testing..Testing…one two three. Wow! This is cool. I can form adult sentences again! 1 plus 1 is 2! Abcdefg….” You laugh being able to fully think and talk again. Patrick asked, “So buddy…What do you think? You are going to stay right? We love having you around as our daughter.”

You nod and give a pretty smile, “Don’t worry Daddy. I’m going to stay. But I have some stipulations you’ll have to agree to.”

Patrick seemed relieved that he wouldn’t have to return to being a little girl again. He smiled, “Sure. Anything! What is it!”

You give him an evil grin, “I’m totally cool with this life. Having a loving mother this time around is much better than my last childhood. This whole girl thing is actually fun. I don’t know why you didn’t relax when you had this body. The clothes are way cuter and wearing dresses are much more comfortable than pants. And we both know how much more beautiful women are than men. I can’t wait to mature and start wearing makeup, sexy dresses…Bikinis…Boobs are going to be exciting!”

Patrick interrupted, “Whoa. That sounds so weird coming from an 18 month old! What’s your stipulation anyway?”

You continue, “As much fun as this life is going to be, I still have most of my male brain. And sucking on Mom’s tits everyday is really starting to make me think. I’ll agree to stay as your daughter forever, if you agree to switch with me now and then.”

“Huh? Switch with you? What do you mean?”

You explain, “You have to agree that whenever I want to, we can come down to Bodies Inc. and swap places. It won’t be for long. Only a few hours or a day or two at a time. Probably only once a month or so. I just have to see what it’s like to sleep with her. My body won’t mature for years. I need a break now and then to experience some adult fun.”

“No way! I’m not going back to wearing frilly dresses and diapers again!”

“Have it your way. Then I’m out! I’ll have our case worker put you back in this body forever then!”

“Whoa whoa! Hold on. I can’t go back to that life.” Patrick thinks it over. He had to wait 9 months to find somebody willing to take that body over. Finding somebody else again might take years. He finally shook his head and put out his hand, “Deal.”

“I’m glad you agreed Daddy! We are going to have so much fun growing up. Just think, you could even go to school for me when I’m older…You could spy on my friends as me….You could even see how my boyfriends treat me… We are going to have such a unique father/daughter experience.”

Patrick groaned. At least he wouldn’t have to permanently go back to that body. Every now and then shouldn’t be that bad.

You winked at him, “Oh yea. I forgot. Mom can’t ever find out about our deal. And by the way, I want our first swap to be today. “ You purposefully smile big and twirl your dress around, “I wore this specially for you . Don’t even think about changing when we get home. You won’t want to raise any suspicion with Mom. Remember that you are taking over MY life now. I’m a little girl who likes being a little girl. You are going to have to act like I’ve been acting for the past 3 months to pull this off. We will be changing places periodically for the rest of our lives. So you need to start getting used to being a girl every now and then.”

Patrick shakes his head realizing he will be wearing the dress home soon.
